name: Brick Breaker (itch) (Fabian Kober)
description:
This is a reimagination of the classic arcade game Breakout in a scifi style and with powerups!

Sit down, relax, listen to the awesome music and break some bricks!

This is a project i started in my freetime but then stopped making new levels because I didn't have time for it anymore. It has six levels, 3 different kinds of powerups and Controller support.
